title: Classic 1 bedroom with office near West Loop and Ukranian Village
posting_body: Tasteful 1 bedroom with additional office/den, 1 bathroom apartment in Noble Square, caddy corner from Bickerdike Park, in quiet building.
Close proximity to West Loop, Ukranian Village, and all they have to offer.
Close to public green, pink, and blue lines on the El.
Amenities included: hardwood floors, expansive living and dining room, and laundry in building.
No security deposit, move in fee of $695.
Tenants are responsible for gas and electric.
Owner responsible for water, tenants responsible for gas and electric.
Cats and small dogs are acceptable with additional $250 one time fee, and landlord approval of the pet (no aggressive breeds for dogs).
